wrote:

>Richard,
>It's Mitsukore.  He was in the Shichirobei line.  Kyo Go=
to no Kenkyu lists him as the 6th generation and Haynes lists him as the 7t=
h.  He was the son of Ryujo.  He died September 7th, 1747.  He also used th=
e names Mitsusuke, Mitsunobu, Mitsutoshi and Joshin (different shin from th=
e more famous Shirobei sandai).
